title: Inspection
description: Establishes requirements for pre-harvest and pre-operation inspections to ensure harvest areas are cleared for operations and buffer zones are properly identified and respected

requirements.text: Are there records of pre-harvest inspections and do they show that the current block (or coded area) is cleared for harvest? If there are no pre-harvest inspections got to 4.02.02.
mandatoryStatements: Pre-harvest inspection records are maintained for each harvest area
Records identify the specific block or coded area inspected
Inspection results clearly indicate clearance status for harvest
Date of inspection and inspector name are recorded
Any issues or concerns identified during inspection are documented
Clearance decision is documented before harvest begins
requirements.verificationExpectations: Weekly review of pre-harvest inspection records for completeness and proper clearance documentation, annual audit of inspection process effectiveness
requirements.monitoringExpectations: Pre-harvest inspection completed before each harvest event for each block or coded area, inspection records reviewed daily

requirements.text: Where pre-harvest inspections have discovered issues, have buffer zones been clearly identified, and at the time of the audit, are those buffer zones being respected?
mandatoryStatements: Buffer zones are established when pre-harvest inspection issues are discovered
Buffer zones are clearly marked and identifiable in the field
Size and boundaries of buffer zones are documented
Reason for buffer zone establishment is recorded
Workers are trained on buffer zone locations and restrictions
Visual verification confirms buffer zones are being respected during harvest
Product from buffer zones is excluded from harvest
Buffer zone status is reassessed before removal
requirements.verificationExpectations: Daily verification during harvest that established buffer zones are properly marked and being respected, weekly review of buffer zone establishment and removal documentation
requirements.monitoringExpectations: Continuous monitoring during harvest operations that no product is harvested from buffer zones, immediate supervisory response if buffer zone violations observed

requirements.text: Is there a pre-operation inspection log?
mandatoryStatements: Pre-operation inspection log is maintained
Inspection is conducted before harvest operations begin each day
Log includes date, time, and inspector identification
Key inspection points are documented (equipment, worker facilities, harvest area conditions)
Any deficiencies found are recorded
Corrective actions for deficiencies are documented
Authorization to proceed with operations is recorded
requirements.verificationExpectations: Weekly review of pre-operation inspection logs for completeness and consistent use, quarterly audit that inspection addresses all critical control points
requirements.monitoringExpectations: Daily verification that pre-operation inspection completed before harvest begins, immediate follow-up on any deficiencies identified

capaInject: If harvest occurs without pre-harvest inspection: immediate halt, conduct inspection, assess product safety before proceeding
If buffer zones not established when required: immediate establishment of buffer zones with 150% of recommended size, hold any potentially affected product
If buffer zone violations observed: immediate halt in affected area, investigate extent of violation, segregate and evaluate product from violation area
If pre-operation inspection not completed: halt operations, complete inspection, address any deficiencies before start
If repeated inspection deficiencies: root cause analysis within 7 days, implement preventive measures, additional training for inspection personnel
traceabilityInject: Pre-harvest inspection records must be traceable to specific blocks or coded areas and harvest dates
Buffer zone records must be traceable to inspection findings, establishment date, location, and removal authorization
Pre-operation inspection logs must be traceable to specific dates and shifts
Product must be traceable to pre-harvest and pre-operation inspection clearances
